name: Hotel Acta Splendid

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: When we booked this hotel they said us that there was heating in the rooms, for our suprise when we arrived at 8 pm, 13 degrees centigrades in the Barcelona, they told us that the city was "caliente" and it wouldn´t be necessary heating. We insisted, they said that they would turn it on, but the temperature continued too cold, we had to take shower and wearing cold clothes, and sleep in a cold bed. we don´t recomend this hotel to anybody.
reviews.title: wrong information

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2007, traveled with friends
reviews.text: My friend and I stayed at the Apsis Hotel in Barcelona for 5 nights at the beginning of March. We found the hotel a little difficult to find although this was probably our own fault, not figuring it out before hand and not being very good at reading a map!
reviews.title: Great hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2007, traveled with family
reviews.text: We got the bus from the airport which was easy and got off at the Universitat stop, it was cheap but if you are like us and get lost easily I would recommend geting a taxi, we did this on the way home and it was roughly €25, this was much easier.
reviews.title: Great location, helpful staff

likes.disliked: — The rooms could have been more soundproof

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We were really pleased with the hotel, the Reception staff were friendly at all times, our room was very clean and cleaned every day during our stay. We didn't have a very good view from our room, just neighbouring walls but as we were out and about all the time this didn't matter.
reviews.title: Above Average 3 Star Hotel

likes.disliked: — Room not available on arrival due water problem

reviews.title: Very pleasant stay indeed
reviews.text: Once we got our bearings the hotel was very well situated, was about 10-15 mins walk from Las Ramblas and only 5 mins from the metro which was used for a few days. You can buy a ticket that you can use 10 times in one zone and we found it didn't expire after a day and ended up being able to use it for 3 days, which came in very handy when our feet were aching.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2007, traveled with family
reviews.text: The hotel is in a great location and easy to walk to Las Ramblas, Gaudi buildings and the Gothic Quarter. We felt safe at all times. We opted for the breakfast and it was well worth it - huge spread of hot and cold items. We traveled with our infant and the hotel was very accommodating - upgraded us to a large room and set up a travel cot. The staff was helpful and gave us maps and good recommendations for eating. Our only complaint was that the rooms aren't completely soundproof and you can hear activity in other rooms.
reviews.title: Great Value

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I have to agree with janemack; we stay in the same period and with the same problems, especially the "buffet police" issue. Very small room, just a few TV channels; for using the minisafe, is a fee of 3 euros/day - not so much, so I advise everyone to make this choice.
reviews.title: Medium quality hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: After all, not so bad experience; the street (Cale de Muntaner) is a safe one, and just across the hotel is a small and friendly restaurant, not overpriced.
reviews.title: Don't bother if you're looking for a rest !

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2007, traveled solo
reviews.text: In the morning, you can find a good choice of various coffes in Jamaica Cafe, which is at 5 minutes walking from hotel, near Universidad.
reviews.title: Good hotel, could have been better.......

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2006, traveled solo
reviews.text: We have just returned from a 4night, 4 day trip to Barcelona, staying at the Apsis Splendid. We arrived late but were welcomed by the staff on duty who spoke very good English. Our room was very small ( 3rd floor ) and overlooked the washing lines, complete with washing for the residents of the area !
reviews.title: Great Hotel! I'd stay there again!!!

likes.disliked: — Rooms are noisy if facing the street

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed at the Hotel Splendid for 4 nights in mid-October. I made the reservation 9 months before our trip to get the best rates. I used their internet site which was easy to follow except for one issue; ordering their breakfast. If you opt for their breakfast buffet at time of reservation a half-price option is presented. At the time of our reservation that would have been 6 dollars each. I missed that screen which was unfortunate because it would have been a good deal.
reviews.title: Great value if you reserve ahead.

likes.disliked: — Quiet but no view, no pool

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Our double room cost 89 Euros for a Wednesday and Thursday and 105 Euros for Friday and Saturday. As the date for our trip approached I continued to monitor the hotel internet site and the price eventually doubled! The tip here is to reserve as early as possible.
reviews.title: happy located tourist

likes.liked: — the stunning bathrooms & the convenient location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The room was on the small side but nicely furnished and quite comfortable. Free Wi-Fi was available in the room as well as air-conditioning, small frig and cable TV with the all important English CNN. The modern, elegant bath room was done in wall-to-wall marble with double sinks and a glass enclosed shower/bath.
reviews.title: Splendid was... Splendid

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2006, traveled with family
reviews.text: Our room faced a small air shaft that was quiet but certainly had no view. The area is near Plaza Catalunia which is close to all the sights and in a relatively safe area. The university is one block away.
reviews.title: Brilliant Little hotel for the price

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2006, traveled with family
reviews.text: All and all we liked the Splendid. The price was great for the quality of the hotel and the interior was clean and modern.
reviews.title: comfortable, modern, great location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel was decent. Small lobby, medium sized room, stylish bathroom but shower head was a bit dodgy.
reviews.title: Location was excellent

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The location was perfect, couldnt have asked for better in that regard.
reviews.title: Nice Place good for short stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2007, traveled with friends
reviews.text: If I was in Barcelona again I would stay here simply because the location was perfect.
reviews.title: Great location, not so great hotel

likes.liked: — The size of the room and bathroom
likes.disliked: — The temperature in the room and the naff view

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2005, traveled solo
reviews.text: This was a lovely hotel, went with my gilfiend, stayed for 5 days. Great place to enjoy the sites of Barca. This hotel is right beside the Universitat Metro Stop so thats great.
reviews.title: Would go back to Apsis Splendid again

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The time we were there there was a new building being built beside us, drills started at 7 in the morning!!!
reviews.title: Helpful Hotel Splendid, Barcelona

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2007, traveled with friends
reviews.text: For our 5-night stay from August 6-11, we took the Aerobus from the BCN airport to Placa Universitat for 3.90 euros and were just a few steps from this hotel. The metro is also literally right around the corner, as is a wonderful bakery and even a Starbucks if you need. Placa Catalunya is between a 5-10 minute leisurely stroll, or one easy subway stop and the shop and restaurant-filled streets Rambla de Catalunya and Passeig de Gracia are just a few minutes walk or one subway stop as well. Having this hotel as our base was so easy because of the fantastic location right by the metro, which we used several times a day with a 4-day pass.
reviews.title: Good, not Great

likes.liked: — location - steps away from the subway
likes.disliked: — some problems - bad TV, wireless internet didn't work

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel itself is a little smaller than I expected, but the rooms, although very small, were well-apointed, very clean, and the beds very comfortable. One downside was that there were no English channels whatsoever (sometimes, CNN International came in fuzzy) - this wasn't a big deal for us as we weren't in the room that much, but I mention it for those who might care. We opted to not take the breakfast for 7 euros a night, so I cannot comment on that, and instead found very good bakeries all around the hotel with croissants for just over 1 euro. There were also several convenience stores and supermarkets in the immediate area, which was nice to be able to keep water and other things in the minibar fridge (although it did not keep things very cold, it was better than nothing).
reviews.title: Very good hotel. Will come again!
Great place to stay
reviews.text: I was never able to get the wireless internet to work, although I know it exists. But on the first floor there is a free computer terminal which was fine to check email, research restaurants and public transportation, and the like.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2007, traveled with family
reviews.text: There were 3-4 different people at the hotel desk that rotated throughout the day and they were very kind and helpful whenever we had a question. It is one of those hotels where your electronic key turns on the lights in the room and then you give the desk the key when you leave for the day. We never had any problems with this.
reviews.title: Helen's 40th Birthday Gift

likes.disliked: — Lack of view from room (no natural light)

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: All in all, for under 100 euros a night for a clean and comfortable room in such a perfect location, I think it is hard to beat. It has the amenities of a bigger establishment but the friendliness of a smaller establishment. Our room faced the street and we still had no problems with noise. It wasn't particularly hot but the room got a bit stuffy at times so the a/c was nice. We had a problem with the a/c and also the TV remote stopped working and the front desk sent people to fix both problems pretty fast, so I would say the staff was very friendly and helpful.
reviews.title: good stay in barcelona

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed two nights in early May prior to a Med cruise.
reviews.title: Similar experience

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Location, breakfast, price and staff all wonderful.
reviews.title: Really enjoyable stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: View of many local apartment buildings.
reviews.title: 'Splendid' location, but don't expect a room with a view!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2007, traveled with family
reviews.text: Airport Taxi was 24 Euro for 2 with 5 bags.
reviews.title: good location

likes.liked: — albert and joseph on the reception desk

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Booked 4 nights at the splendid. read the reviews from this site, so thought we would give it a go. First impressions were pleasing.
reviews.title: Great Hotel - couldn't fault it at all

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Just returned from our stay at the Apsis Splendid. Everything positive that has been said previously about this hotel is correct. It is a geat price for a good hotel with a perfect location.
reviews.title: great location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel is a few minutes walk from the Ramblas in a nice quiet street. It is perfect to get the Aerobus to as only 2 minutes from the stop at Universitat. The hotel staff are excellent and very helpful.
reviews.title: Great location, very nice hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2007
reviews.text: The breakfast was included in the price and very good too. Very safe location and the rooms are what you would expect from this very good 3 star hotel. If it had a few more frills it could pass as a 4 star easily. Nonetheless, an excellent city hotel.
reviews.title: Highly recommended hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We travel extensively, and this hotel does what it says on the tin. Free internet access a winner too. Don't hesitate, book it today.
reviews.title: Good hotel,Great location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We recently spent 4 nights at the Apsis Splendid. We found the location to be very convenient, just steps from the Placa Univesitat stop of the Airport bus, close to the Metro and within a short walk from the Ramblas. The staff was very friendly and helpful. The room was spacious, clean and modern and had a safe which we rented for Euro 3 per day and a conveniently priced minibar. We did not book the breakfast but had our breakfasts at the bar across the street, which provided for a nice and inexpensive local experience. Overall a very positive experience. We would definitely stay there again.
reviews.title: Nice Hotel for the Price

description: Acta Splendid Hotel is a three star hotel in Barcelona ideal for a few days visiting the city, is located in the Eixample district, allowing you to walk to the center in a few minutes. It has 40 rooms that feature soft and modern decor.
